author: jstrachan
msg: hacked the doclets a tad so that they output nicer XML with XML headers

author: jstrachan
msg: Added the <catch> tag from the JSTL so that we can now properly catch exceptions and conditionally process them or perform custom exception logging inside Jelly scripts.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added some extra methods so that its easier to run scripts from a File or URL with relative and absolute URI support in <j:include> still working fine.
Also patched the demo:soap goal so that the example.jelly file includes the babelfish tag library example, making it easier to run

author: jstrachan
msg: Now using patched version of dom4j so that we output namespace declarations on static content in a Jelly script.
This should fix dIon's recent issue with SOAP namespaces.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patch to output namespace declarations on static content in a Jelly script.
This patch actually highlights a minor bugette in dom4j's XMLWriter that I'll patch very shortly.
So this should nearly fix dIon's recent issue with SOAP namespaces. One more minor patch and it should be done...
